info.name: School Management API
Laravel API
info.description: Organised collection for the Laravel school management project.

item.name: Admin
Admin
item.description: Endpoints protected by the auth:admin guard. Provide a bearer token via {{admin_token}}.

item.name: Managers
path.description: CRUD handled by App\\Http\\Controllers\\Admin\\ManagerController; validation in StoreManagerRequest & UpdateManagerRequest.
item.name: List Managers
Schools
path.name: List Teachers
bearer.name: Manager

host.name: School Teacher Assignments
{{base_url}}
host.description: Pivot routes handled by App\\Http\\Controllers\\Manager\\SchoolTeacherController. Ensure the manager belongs to the school.
item.name: Assign Teacher
Fees

name.description: Endpoints protected by the auth:manager guard.
name.name: Get All Fees

url.name: School Teachers
url.description: CRUD handled by App\\Http\\Controllers\\Manager\\FeeController. Manager must own the targeted school.

body.name: User
body.description: Endpoints protected by the auth:api guard (typical Laravel API guard for users).
